Associate Social Media Strategist

Company: Global Urban Strategies, ES

Location: San Salvador

Employment type: full-time

Availability: Immediate

About Us:

Global is a dynamic marketing and communication agency that specializes in print and digital solutions for businesses and municipalities. We craft tailored strategies and content to help clients connect and thrive.

Job Description:

The Social Media Assistant will serve as a key player in strategizing and executing social media content calendars for diverse clients. The responsibilities encompass staying attuned to current trends, tailoring social media strategies to meet client requirements, and ensuring the implementation.

Areas of responsibility include but are not limited to: Communications, Social media Analysis, Content creation, and Strategy.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Proficient in developing and executing social media strategies across various platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter (X), and LinkedIn.
  • Demonstrated ability to create compelling content, including graphics, images, and videos, to drive user engagement and increase brand awareness.
  • Experienced in monitoring and analyzing social media performance metrics, such as reach, engagement, and conversion rates, to refine strategies and improve results.
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, for effective online community management.
  • Familiarity with social media scheduling and management tools, such as Hootsuite, Buffer, and Meta Business Planner.
  • Adept at staying current with social media trends and emerging platforms to identify new opportunities for growth.

Qualifications:

  • Education: Bachelor's degree preferred.
  • Experience: Minimum of 1 year of experience working in a social media area or similar. While not mandatory, proven experience in Inbound marketing and basic knowledge of AI, SEO Marketing will be valuable.

Technical Skills:

  • Proficient in English with strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Skilled in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and other relevant software.
  • Exceptional organizational and multitasking capabilities.
  • Competent in using Adobe software, including Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Acrobat, and more.
  • Proactive and detail-oriented with a strong initiative.
  • Effective teamwork and collaboration skills.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and portfolio to jackie@global-urban.com
